com.facebook.buck.util

Class DefaultProcessExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.util.DefaultProcessExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProcessExecutor

    public class DefaultProcessExecutor
extends Object
implements ProcessExecutor
    Executes a Process and blocks until it is finished.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.util.ProcessExecutor

        ProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess, ProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcessImpl, ProcessExecutor.Option, ProcessExecutor.Result

      • launchAndExecute

        public ProcessExecutor.Result launchAndExecute(ProcessExecutorParams params,
                                               Set<ProcessExecutor.Option> options,
                                               Optional<String> stdin,
                                               Optional<Long> timeOutMs,
                                               Optional<java.util.function.Consumer<Process>> timeOutHandler)
                                        throws InterruptedException,
                                               IOException
        Description copied from interface: ProcessExecutor
        Launches then executes a process with the specified params.

        If options contains ProcessExecutor.Option.PRINT_STD_OUT, then the stdout of the process will be written directly to the stdout passed to the constructor of this executor. Otherwise, the stdout of the process will be made available via ProcessExecutor.Result.getStdout().

        If options contains ProcessExecutor.Option.PRINT_STD_ERR, then the stderr of the process will be written directly to the stderr passed to the constructor of this executor. Otherwise, the stderr of the process will be made available via ProcessExecutor.Result.getStderr().

        Specified by:
        launchAndExecute in interface ProcessExecutor
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        IOException

      • waitForLaunchedProcess

        public ProcessExecutor.Result waitForLaunchedProcess(ProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess launchedProcess)
                                              throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: ProcessExecutor
        Blocks while waiting for a process previously returned by ProcessExecutor.launchProcess(ProcessExecutorParams) to exit, then returns the exit code of the process. After this method returns, the launchedProcess can no longer be passed to any methods of this object.
        Specified by:
        waitForLaunchedProcess in interface ProcessExecutor
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • waitForLaunchedProcessWithTimeout

        public ProcessExecutor.Result waitForLaunchedProcessWithTimeout(ProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess launchedProcess,
                                                                long millis,
                                                                Optional<java.util.function.Consumer<Process>> timeOutHandler)
                                                         throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: ProcessExecutor
        As ProcessExecutor.waitForLaunchedProcess(LaunchedProcess) but with a timeout in milliseconds.
        Specified by:
        waitForLaunchedProcessWithTimeout in interface ProcessExecutor
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • execute

        public ProcessExecutor.Result execute(ProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess launchedProcess,
                                      Set<ProcessExecutor.Option> options,
                                      Optional<String> stdin,
                                      Optional<Long> timeOutMs,
                                      Optional<java.util.function.Consumer<Process>> timeOutHandler)
                               throws InterruptedException
        Executes the specified already-launched process.

        If options contains Option#PRINT_STD_OUT, then the stdout of the process will be written directly to the stdout passed to the constructor of this executor. Otherwise, the stdout of the process will be made available via Result#getStdout().

        If options contains Option#PRINT_STD_ERR, then the stderr of the process will be written directly to the stderr passed to the constructor of this executor. Otherwise, the stderr of the process will be made available via Result#getStderr().

        Parameters:
        timeOutHandler - If present, this method will be called before the process is killed.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
